mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, name, password, role, profile_picture_original, profile_picture_modify) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{role}, #{profileImageName}, #{profileImageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT email, name, password, role, profile_picture_original AS profileImageName, profile_picture_modify AS profileImageUrl, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM members WHERE email = #{email}
